body:
Implemented full GitFlow support through the GUI.

## New Features
- **GitFlow initialization wizard** - 5-step configuration (branch names, prefixes, merge strategy, auto-push settings)
- **Start Branch dialogs** - Create feature/release/hotfix branches with semantic version suggestions
- **Finish Branch dialog** - Merge strategy selection (Merge/Squash/Rebase), tag creation, changelog preview
- **Visual branch indicators** - Color-coded dots for branch types (purple=feature, yellow=release, red=hotfix, blue=main, green=develop)
- **Settings integration** - GitFlow status and configuration in Settings dialog

## New Files
- `Services/IGitFlowService.cs`, `GitFlowService.cs` - Core GitFlow operations
- `Models/GitFlowConfig.cs`, `GitFlowStatus.cs`, `SemanticVersion.cs` - Data models
- `Views/GitFlowInitDialog.xaml(.cs)` - Initialization wizard
- `Views/StartBranchDialog.xaml(.cs)` - Start feature/release/hotfix
- `Views/FinishBranchDialog.xaml(.cs)` - Finish with merge options

## Usage
Right-click any branch ? **GitFlow** menu to:
- Initialize GitFlow
- Start Feature/Release/Hotfix
- Finish/Publish branches

## Testing
All 12 integration tests passed covering:
- Initialization workflow
- Feature branch lifecycle (start ? commit ? finish)
- Release branch lifecycle (start ? commit ? finish with tag)
- Semantic version detection from tags
- Changelog generation from conventional commits
